name: 10 Ideas of Play-to-Earn
description: Created by @0xAikoDai and @Mapleleafcap of Folius Ventures, NFT technology powered by HelloWeb3Team. Are there ways to stabilize in-game FX & make P2E economies more sustainable?@0xAikoDai & @MapleLeafCap came up w/ 10 ideas esp. for games w/ heavy PvE + dual tokens. These ain’t no panacea – just our opinions & hope to inspire developers exploring the fog of war.
